goal.ch: 學會企劃案、自傳、議論文撰寫(報告撰寫)等，日常中會使用到的應用文書。
goal.en: Learn to write project proposals, autobiographies, argumentative essays (report writing), and other practical documents that are used in daily life.

outline.en: Project proposal, argumentative essay report writing, autobiography

gradMethod.ch:
1.出席：
本課程有很多小組討論，同學如果請假、無故缺席會給同組同學帶來不便，故酌予扣分，說明如下：
○1無故缺席扣出席成績3分
○2請假扣1分，補請假請務必在兩周內提出，否則視同無故缺席。
○3曠課一節扣1分。
○4公假不扣(請出示公假證明)。
2.平時各項作業： 
○1企劃案：以小組為單位進行評分(20分)+組員互評(5分)
○2讀書心得寫作15分
○3閱讀與表達能力測驗兩次，共計10分。準時繳交者可以得5分，遲交、缺交0分。
○4自傳：每人交一篇，20分
○5議論文作業：每人交一篇，25分
○6學期學習狀況自評： 5分。
2.額外加、扣分標準
○1課堂積極發言者，酌狀況加1~3分
○2學期中，會出幾次加分作業，同學可視狀況自由填寫
○3自傳發表會。有意參加與發表的同學，請自行找講評的同伴。發表人準備3分鐘的上台發表，之後講評人講評1分鐘。發表人可加5分，講評人可加2分。
○4遲交作業一天，扣該項作業成績一分，扣完為止，不倒扣。
gradMethod.en:
1.Attendance:
This course has many group discussions. If students take leave or are absent without reason, it will cause inconvenience to their group members, so points will be deducted accordingly. The explanation is as follows:
。Unexcused absence will result in a deduction of 3 points from the attendance score.
。Leave of absence will result in a deduction of 1 point. Please make sure to submit any requests for leave within two weeks; otherwise, it will be considered an unexcused absence.
。Skipping one class will result in a deduction of 1 point.
。Public leave is not deducted (please present public leave certificate).

2. Regular operations:
。Project Proposal: Scoring by group (20 points) + Peer evaluation among group members (5 points)
。Reading Reflection Writing 15 points
。Reading and expression ability tests are conducted twice, totaling 10 points. Those who submit on time can earn 5 points, while late or missing submissions receive 0 points.
。Autobiography: Each person submits one, 20 points.
。Discussion Paper Assignment: Each person submits one, worth 25 points.
。Self-evaluation of semester learning status: 5 points.

3. Additional Points and Deduction Standards
。Active participants in class discussions will receive an additional 1 to 3 points based on the situation.
。During the semester, there will be several extra credit assignments, and students can fill them out freely based on their circumstances.
。Autobiography presentation meeting. Students who are interested in participating and presenting, please find a peer for feedback on your own. Presenters should prepare a 3-minute presentation, followed by 1 minute of feedback from the reviewer. Presenters can earn an additional 5 points, and reviewers can earn an additional 2 points.
。If the assignment is submitted one day late, one point will be deducted from the score of that assignment, and deductions will continue until the full penalty is applied, with no negative scoring.
